posts.title: [Post Oficial] Lost Odyssey (con guia oficial )
posts.content: Se sabe si la versión americana tendrá también las mejoras de la PAL y los subtítulos en Castellano?

posts.title: [Post Oficial] Lost Odyssey (con guia oficial )
posts.content:
Okey

 

Y por último, en una entrevista en GameSpot hace poco

 

GS: Moving on to Lost Odyssey, you're showing that game here as well. Can you give us an update on how development is going? What stage are you at? Is it progressing as you'd hoped?

 

HS: It's going very well. The development process is going quite smoothly. In fact, there is a beta version coming out next month. So we're hopeful that we're going to get the game out at the end of the year. And it boasts the great graphical enhancements that come from Unreal Engine 3.

posts.title: [Post Oficial] Lost Odyssey (con guia oficial )
posts.content:
De IGN.com

 

Hironobu Sakaguchi's Lost Oddyssey, the RPG that most resembles the Final Fantasy series, is slated for a worldwide release (North America, Europe, and Japan) this fall.

Y en 1up.com

 

In a pre-GDC meeting with 1UP, Final Fantasy creator Hironobu Sakaguchi revealed that Lost Odyssey, the second RPG from Sakaguchi's Mistwalker Studios, would ship this Christmas

posts.title: [Post Oficial] Lost Odyssey (con guia oficial )
posts.content:
Noticia de Meristation

 

Lost Oddyssey, todavía sin fecha exacta de lanzamiento, promete un lanzamiento simultáneo en todo el mundo a lo largo del presente año fiscal.

posts.title: [Post Oficial] Lost Odyssey (con guia oficial )
posts.content: Pero si dijo Sakaguchi que iba a salir MUNDIALMENTE en Navidad... busco sus declaraciones y os las copio
